title: Grab the Amazon Fire stick for LESS than 30 Bucks with this Deal!
description: Turn your old TV into a smart-streaming platform. The post Grab the Amazon Fire stick for LESS than 30 Bucks with this Deal! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Turn your old TV into a smart-streaming platform.
text: While smart TVs are an awesome way to stream shows and movies on demand, they are pretty expensive and might be beyond the budget of most users who just want to scratch that Netflix itch. One alternative to get the functionality of a smart TV though is by getting an add-on that will allow your TV to access services such as Netflix, Hulu, YouTube, and more. As such, Amazon’s Fire TV Stick is a great option for people looking to do just that. Easy to set-up, the Fire TV Stick’s plug-and-play feature lets you access an insane amount of content from top streaming sites, and comes with movies and shows from Amazon as well, all in Full HD resolution. One thing to note though is that you will need Wi-Fi, an HMDI port on your TV, and a power outlet. You can grab the Fire TV Stick for a super low price right now using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart. Want to Save BIG on the HMD Skyline? html:
While smart TVs are an awesome way to stream shows and movies on demand, they are pretty expensive and might be beyond the budget of most users who just want to scratch that Netflix itch. One alternative to get the functionality of a smart TV though is by getting an add-on that will allow your TV to access services such as Netflix, Hulu, YouTube, and more.

As such, Amazon’s Fire TV Stick is a great option for people looking to do just that. Easy to set-up, the Fire TV Stick’s plug-and-play feature lets you access an insane amount of content from top streaming sites, and comes with movies and shows from Amazon as well, all in Full HD resolution. One thing to note though is that you will need Wi-Fi, an HMDI port on your TV, and a power outlet. You can grab the Fire TV Stick for a super low price right now using the link below.

Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.

A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart.
